name: Greek Zoodle Salad
author: France C
summary: Zoodles (zucchini noodles) are all the rage and I keep looking for new ways to prepare them. I decided to combine my love of Greek salad with the zoodles and came up with this recipe. A great alternative to high-carb pasta salads!
ingredients: 10  cherry tomatoes, halved, or more to taste
10  pitted kalamata olives, halved, or more to taste
¼ cup thinly sliced red onion
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Cut zucchini into noodle-shaped strands using a spiralizing tool
Place "zoodles" in a large bowl and top with cucumber, tomatoes, olives, red onion, and feta cheese
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper together in a bowl until dressing is smooth; pour over "zoodle" mixture and toss to coat
Marinate salad in refrigerator for 10 to 15 minutes
